about_the_game:
Memories and regrets that exist in your school days. And "Growth"

How was your school days? "Beginning of the Rain" tells you a lot of different stories that take place in a lot of efforts to make your youth more beautiful.
It's a work that contains everything that two ordinary students who finished their school years by graduating from high school have felt so far.

"Beginning of the Rain" is a Visual Novel simulation game based on emotional illustrations and OSTs. With a deep but not profound scenario, you can play it freely, pleasantly with pretty graphics, and emotionally with the atmosphere of the music. Like reading a book, like watching an animation at the same time. immerse oneself in either direction if you look at it, it is a game where many elements of the game come to your mind around a beautiful story.

Recalling memories, sometimes looking to the future. Fall into a story of empathy that's like a part of yourself!
